price: 你们当防备将来有一日，你们要被召归于安拉，然后人人都得享受自己行为的完全的报酬而他们不受亏枉。
arabic: وَٱتَّقُواْ يَوۡمٗا تُرۡجَعُونَ فِيهِ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ ثُمَّ تُوَفَّىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا كَسَبَتۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittaqū yawman tur'jaʿūna fīhi ilā al-lahi thumma tuwaffā kullu nafsin mā kasabat wahum lā yuẓ'lamūna
